forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the city of San Francisco awakens, the atmosphere carries a soft embrace of marine air, hinting at the slight chance of drizzle overnight. The clouds linger, their wispy forms obscuring the gentle glow of dawn. Temperatures rest comfortably around 57 degrees, with a light west-southwest wind whispering through the streets. 

As the day unfolds, those heading out can expect the clouds to part, revealing the city’s iconic skyline under a mostly sunny sky. With a peak temperature nudging 66 degrees, there’s a refreshing chill that will gradually give way to warmth as the afternoon settles in. The breeze picks up, fluttering through neighborhood parks and along the waterfront, making this a delightful day for a leisurely stroll or a visit to a local café. Dressed in layers, a light sweater or jacket will be your ally as you navigate the cooler morning air, giving way to a pleasant tartness of early autumn as the sun climbs higher. In these tranquil hours, consider exploring a small art gallery or indulging in a book at your favorite haunt, each moment savoring the city’s charm as it quietly bustles to life.
